Hydras/nighlight/Perceptor/Kup/


Hydras:

 Hydras laughted, it was a deep =
evil laughth and looking to around him said "Throw away Your weapons... I d=
ont like any futher disturbance"said the male, Kup against his will throw h=
is weapon"Perceptor..."

"Yes, Sir" said the male 

"Take Darkhawk to Crs" =
said the male while he looked the femenine figure showed in the chamber "ah=
hh, little one... Come here" Nigthlight obeyed  and moved behind Hydras "Gl=
ente bots" said lookign to Scorponok, and the others  "take this autobots t=
o the dungeons and Prime, this is your lucky day... We have a very special =
dungeon for guest like you... I must decide what I'll do with all you, Stil=
l i cant forgive your break in but I'm willing so much to boost my ranks. T=
ied up their hands"

PErceptor took an unconceus Darkhawk to crs.


From: S=
andy 
Sent: Tuesday, April 13, 2010 10:02 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Su=
bject: Re: BlackFortress


  
Tucson Prime knew it would be senseless to ri=
sk his minions due to his own tactical mistakes. He subspaces the missile c=
hambers and powers down the weaponry. Night Shift also submits, and subspac=
es his own weaponry.

The newly appointed Autobot leader still had much to =
learn, and he knew it. He wasn't perfect, it would take some time to be as =
knowledgable as Optimus Prime. 

"Everyone, I'm sorry, I made a mistake. Th=
ey're right, I was off in my tactics, so I am asking all of you to stand do=
wn and do as told. I will not risk anyone elses lives here this day. Jhiaxu=
s, you have my word. All weapons are powered down and we will abide by Hydr=
as' commands."

Night Shift was not angry at his leader. He looks to him si=
ncerely.

"Ya know, admittn' that you're wrong like that, that takes a lott=
a courage sir."

Tucson Prime sighs.

" Thank you. I'm only doing what I fe=
el is best for everyone's saftey."

Night Shift looks over at Rodimus his e=
yes narrow.

" Ya know, Tucson Prime wouldn'tve made this effort for just a=
nyone. He's risked his spark ta try'n get ya back. That's right, he didn't =
come here for some half baked power trip, he came back here because he real=
ly cares about you. The least you can do, is return the favor'n make some s=
orta effort ta come around'n try and remember who you are, and what you sta=
nd for. Because right now, I'm just gonna have ta call ya Hot Rod. There ai=
n't no Prime in there that I can see. Nope, not at all. Not one trace. Ther=
e, I said my peace, and now I'm gonna do as told."

Tucson Prime does nothi=
ng to rebel against orders. Yet, he listens to Night Shift carefully.

" Al=
l right Hydras, ball is in your court. I will comply to your demands as you=
 wish."

ernal weaponry, the wall

 over the loud speakers could be heard, however to the

t was not Cyclonus' but one that was somehow deeper

 same time, it was Jhiaxus. "It would appear
> Tuscon Prime that your asses=
sment of the situation is not as it would
> seem."
> 
> "Entering this base=
 without preperation, and leading your back up in
> here without assesing t=
he true odds against you was a tactical flaw on
> your part." The voice con=
tinued coldly.
> 
> "If you do anything other than follow the very specific=
 orders of our
> leader Hydras, I will have the entire arsonal of this faci=
lity open
> fire on you." The energy cannons that were in the room began to=
 glow
> as they prepared for action, "You will comply."
>

it was at this point that Rodimus showed up with
